member.name: T:EH.PCPS.TestAutomation.HARTCommunication.V1037.Functions.ApplicationArea.MainView.Execution.Configuration

member.name: M:EH.PCPS.TestAutomation.HARTCommunication.V1037.Functions.ApplicationArea.MainView.Execution.Configuration.Confirm
member.summary: Press [Ok]-button to confirm settings and close dialog.

member.name: M:EH.PCPS.TestAutomation.HARTCommunication.V1037.Functions.ApplicationArea.MainView.Execution.Configuration.Apply
member.summary: Press [Apply]-button to confirm settings only. Dialog remains open.

member.name: M:EH.PCPS.TestAutomation.HARTCommunication.V1037.Functions.ApplicationArea.MainView.Execution.Configuration.Cancel
member.summary: Press [Cancel]-button to close dialog without changed settings.

member.name: M:EH.PCPS.TestAutomation.HARTCommunication.V1037.Functions.ApplicationArea.MainView.Execution.Configuration.SetProperties(System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Sets HART Communication configuration by checking string parameters for content. If parameter is not empty, configuration is done with parameters. If parameter is empty, no configuration is done. Default is used.
member.param:
Communication Interface:
HART modem
HART multiplexer
